channel.title: Introduction :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script In this module, we’re going to learn about algorithms. But before we can discuss algorithms, let’s take a look at something that you might be very familiar with and see how it actually relates to the idea of an algorithm. For example, we can ask ourselves, how do you shuffle cards? It’s something that is really hard to describe. But once you see it, and you can observe other people doing it, it’s pretty easy to understand what’s going on.
